summary: This code is running the C/C++ Code Style Analysis Tool (ccls) on a given file. The `echo {}` part pipes an empty string to ccls for analysis or compilation. This could be used in scripting to automate checks on C/C++ code.

details.comment: This code is running the C/C++ Code Style Analysis Tool (ccls) on a given file. The `echo {}` part pipes an empty string to ccls for analysis or compilation. This could be used in scripting to automate checks on C/C++ code.
